verses.verse: הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu O praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim; all ye nations שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ <S%H7623><s%> be-Chu-hu, praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H523><s%> ha-'um-Mim. him all ye people

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for גָ֘בַ֤ר <S%H1396><s%> ga-Var is great עָלֵ֨ינוּ׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu toward חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do, For his merciful וֶֽאֱמֶת־ <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-met- toward us and the truth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, [endureth] for ever הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
